channel.title: The Mark of the Beast on Mga Kristiyanong Hesus
channel.description: Recent content in The Mark of the Beast on Mga Kristiyanong Hesus

item.title: The Mark of the Beast
item.description: The last book of the Bible is called The Revelation by Protestants and The Apocalypse by Catholics. It is a poetic description of the battle between good and evil, using numerous symbols and creatures to illustrate its message.
